short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate plugin code based on entity name and action

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "Plugin Code Generator for MS CRM" Chrome extension likely provides a streamlined and automated way to generate code snippets or templates for plugins in Microsoft Dynamics CRM.
